es.ed0.tinyjson.parser

Class JSONParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ed0.tinyjson.parser.JSONParser

  • public class JSONParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for parsing JSONObject and JSONArray from string or files

    • Method Summary

        Returns:
        new JSONObject
        Throws:

      • saveJSONToFile

        public void saveJSONToFile(JSONEntity<?> json,
                           java.io.File file)
                    throws JSONException
        Write the given JSONObject or JSONArray as text to the given file. If the file does not exist it will be created, if it does exist its content will be overwritten.
        Parameters:
        json - JSONEntity to save
        file - File
        Throws:
        JSONException - If the operation failed

      • saveJSONToFile

        public void saveJSONToFile(JSONEntity<?> json,
                           java.io.File file,
                           boolean pretty)
                    throws JSONException
        Write the given JSONObject or JSONArray as text to the given file. If the file does not exist it will be created, if it does exist its content will be overwritten.
        Parameters:
        json - JSONEntity to save
        file - File
        pretty - If true the JSON will be formatted
        Throws:
        JSONException - If the operation failed
